Description.Text: The hotel facilities and services include 24 h reception with safe services (paid on spot), lobby area with TV, free Wi-Fi in the lobby and reception area and bar with terrace. Outdoors, at the well taken care gardens you can find a playground, swimming pool, children's pool surrounded by sun beds and umbrellas, snack bar, mini golf, table tennis and tennis court. The Hotel is located on the main road of Tingaki where just across you can find the biggest supermarket in the area, carrying lots of souvenirs, clothing and everything you need for your holidays. Outside there is a bus stop convenient for your transportations to Kos Town. The rooms are equipped with A/C ,telephone, water boiler, refrigerator, balcony or terrace, bathroom with shower, hair dryer and iron on request from the reception free of charge.

Sunset hotel is located in the resort of Tingaki, one of the most popular destinations of the island of Kos. The summer hotel is only 800m from the long sandy beach, 12km from Kos Town and 15km away from Hippokratis International Airport. It is only few minutes walk from shops, bars and restaurants in Tingaki
